name: Facebook Glass Pane Theme/Skin
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
The Facebook glass pane theme is a modern and transparent design that creates a seamless and visually appealing experience for users when browsing the Facebook website. The theme is achieved using a combination of CSS code that is injected into the Facebook page using a code injector extension such as Tampermonkey, GreaseMonkey, and Code Injector. Code Injector(Extension)> #: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/code-injector/edkcmfocepnifkbnbkmlcmegedeikdeb #: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/codeinjector/
additional_info:
#: 7/25/23|>
Version 1.0>
First release for the Facebook Glass Pane. In this release, have made several changes to the glass pane to enhance overall user experience.

Changes Made:

   1.  Background Image
   2. Glass Effect
   3. Fonts
   4. Color of Text
